website_summaries.verdict: Minerals and plant extracts, help keep ultra-dry skin hydrated all day long.
pros: The light gel formula is easy to apply with a cooling feel and a fresh scent
Skin is left feeling refreshed and nourished without being sticky
It even helped with rosacea and dry patches
cons: Some users found they went through the product quickly

customer_reviews.title: Contains silicone, buyer beware...
customer_reviews.text: I love other Simple products and it has been my go to brand. I have large pores and acne prone skin, which does not do well with dimethicone. I bought this because the other Simple moisturizer I use does not contain it, but this one does. Sadly, silicone makes your skin soft but does not actually allow your pores to breathe or to absorb the benefical properties of most moisturizers.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Moisturizer For Oily Skin
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!!! I LOVE LOVE LOVE this moisturizer!!!! I am in my mid 40s. I have always had oily, acne prone skin. I have tried many, many other moisturizers, only to have them leave me more oily or cause break outs or make my rosasea more red. This moisturizer is absolutely perfect! It makes my skin soft and supple. Absorbs well, helps my bb cream go on more evenly and smoothly and has actually helped to lessen the amount of oil my skin produces. I can't find one negative thing about this. It's just perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rsue92

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why some reviews say ( that it lasted only two weeks and that they had to use a lot of it!) Unless you have a huge face It makes no sense to use so much. The cream is watery and a little goes a long way. I bought this 3 weeks ago and still have a plenty left! I use 2x a day and this has improved my rosacea drastically! With the 1st use all the redness and dry patches in my face disappeared..Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using this moisturizer for about five days, but so far I love it! I have very dry, acne prone, sensitive, eczema prone skin. This has been very hydrating without leaving my skin oily. I usually have an issue with my foundation creasing/settling into dry patches throughout the day, since I’ve been using this I haven’t had that issue at all! The bottle is a little smaller than what I expected, but a little goes a long way. A dime sized amount is plenty to cover my face and neck. 10/10, would recommend and will be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive, dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin on my face, so usually moisturizers make my face burn and turn red, even simple formulas like Cerave. However, this lotion is a water-based serum type, which isn't irritating at all which is so nice! It's super hydrating as well and a sheer moisturizer too! Love it and recommend other products from this brand as well!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: LOVE for dry, dehydrated skin.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve re-purchased this item after my first use and I’m in love. I’ve never used simple products before but I was looking for a hydrating moisturizer that didn’t cost $80 in most stores. I use this morning and night after I’ve washed my face and put on my serum, and then apply this. I also use the Simple brand face wash and I have noticed a huge difference in the texture of my skin. My skin feels healthier and I don’t dread my nighttime skin routine anymore. I will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Moisturizer, but Needs to Come With More Product.
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is okay in terms of how it made my skin feel and I don't think it broke me out. However, I burned through it really fast. Typically a jar or small tube of moisturizer lasts me about a month, this barely made it two weeks. You seem to have to use a lot of it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Simply good
customer_reviews.text: I am that kind of person who hates to put tons of creams and chemicals on myself. But during winter my face skin got very dry and looked bad too. So I was searching for a hydrating face cream. This one is as simple, as it claims - almost no smell, not sticky, absorbs quickly and skin does feel better. I agree that the bottle is really small for the money but after using it for a few weeks I see that I'm using very little cream each time (it is not a body lotion, so you don't need to put a ton of product at once). Overall I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Dr. Lin hydrating gel
customer_reviews.text: I'm picky when it comes to face moisturizers so I was thrilled when I discovered Dr. Lin's hydrating gel years ago. It used to cost $10 but now it's $30. I mean come on, that's completely absurd. So I needed to find a new moisturizer stat! This moisturizer is nice, it definitely moisturizes my face without leaving a greasy feeling. It is a small bottle, but a little bit goes a long way! I've been using it once daily for a little over a month and I'm just now starting to run low. Overall I'm really happy with this moisturizer!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Makes my face feel nourished

customer_reviews.author: shopper365

The tube is very small and for almost $6 I was like alright we can try this, but I only received about half of the product and it was a big waste of my money. I’ll be trying the rest of the product so it won’t completely go to waste. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jade ❤

Very pleased with this item and this line of products.

It doesn't continue to keep my face moisturized, I just get about an hour of it sitting on my face. Because of all of that it isn't the best moisturizer for my skin (really really dry). I prefer the Neutrogena Hydro Boost moisturizer. I have no complaints about that one, so if stickiness bothers you, consider going to that one. 👍
